Conference Program

ACM SIGGRAPH VRCAI 2025 will be held from December 10-12, 2025, in Macau, China. Below is the detailed program for the conference.

Note: This is a preliminary schedule and is subject to change. The exact paper sessions and presentation times will be determined after paper acceptance notifications.

Day 1 - December 10, 2025 (Wednesday)

Opening Ceremony and Keynote Presentations

Venue: International Conference Hall, Building A, Macau University of Science and Technology

08:30 - 09:30
Registration and Check-in

Opening Ceremony

Guest Speeches

Keynote I

Speaker: TBD

Topic: Virtual Reality Technology Trends in the Metaverse Era

Speaker: TBD

Topic: AI-Empowered Immersive Experiences

Track B: Interaction and Interfaces (Room 205, Building A)

15:30 - 16:00

16:00 - 18:00
Paper Sessions (Tracks A/B)

Track A: Digital Humans and Virtual Communities (Room 203, Building A)

Track B: Application Domains (Room 205, Building A)

18:30 - 20:30
Welcome Reception

Location: Banquet Hall, MUST Hotel

Time: December 11, 18:30-20:30

Note: Optional event, guide service will be provided

Presentation Guidelines

Oral Presentations

  • Full Paper: 20 minutes presentation + 5 minutes Q&A
  • Short Paper: 15 minutes presentation + 3 minutes Q&A
  • Please prepare your presentation in PowerPoint or PDF format
  • Please arrive at your session room 15 minutes before the start of your session and provide your presentation to the staff

Poster Presentations

  • Poster Size: A0 (841mm × 1189mm), Portrait orientation
  • Exhibition Time: December 11, 16:00-18:00
  • Authors are required to stand by their posters during the exhibition time to present their work to attendees

Demo Presentations

  • Exhibition Time: December 11, 16:00-18:00
  • Exhibition Space: Table, power supply, and basic internet connection will be provided
  • Please bring your own equipment and demonstration materials
  • For special equipment support, please contact the organizing committee in advance
